title: changes to user_external
body:
the external user app is missing a few features that are critical to my usage.  for example, when authenticating via imap, a user directory is created, but the user doesn't show up in the user list, nor is the user available for file sharing.  my guess is that it's all related to a user record not being created in the database.  even if the maintainers do fix this, i'm sure it won't be available for a while, but i need it now.

so, i don't mind digging into the code to make the changes, and giving those back to the project.  i need to know the following first:

how does the system work without imap, and how does it work with.
what files are involved with both db and imap authentication, and what do estimate should be changed to get this to work?

thanks.
